result.purpose: Handles HTTP requests related to decoding Ethereum transactions and managing signatures in a web3 context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file handles specific aspects of web3 functionality related to HTTP requests.

internal/domains/web3/handlers/decode.go.purpose: Handles decoding of Ethereum transactions, calls, and logs via HTTP endpoints.

internal/domains/web3/handlers/signature.purpose: Handles HTTP requests for managing signatures in a web3 context.
